children.subject: Thanks for putting this together.
We haven’t released one yet (there’ll be one eventually)
When can we expect it to be released?
Some time this week.

Sorry to get back to you so late with bad news - due to budget issues + smaller fall enrollment, we won't be able to do any external hiring for fall term. If you would still like to be involved with CS 61B, please apply to be an AI when that application comes out in fall!
Thank you for letting me know! Just to clarify, does that mean that you will not be accepting any new TAs for the fall semester?
We don't currently plan to accept any new TAs or tutors for the fall semester.
<md>If we were accepted as staff for summer (CS 61BL), would we be able to serve on staff for Fall?</md>
Not automatically, no

If your first time would be Summer 2022, then unfortunately, not at this time - right now we're mainly looking towards returning staff who have already been through a term, since that's a really strong signal.

Er, sorry - to clarify, we won't be able to consider first-time SU22 staff for the first round of hiring. That said, we're leaving open the (small?) possibility of getting additional money during FA22, at which point we would consider first-time SU22 staff as well.
Is there any update on 61B’s hiring for fall?
Nope - we sent a list to Josh but haven't heard back from him.
Are there any updates on this?
Hi! Is there a supplemental app for CS 61B?
WIll there be one for CS10?
Applications for AIs generally come out after final grades are released iirc.
Are the applications for CS10 AI's out?
<md>same as the departmental deadline i'm pretty sure (61a doesn't _usually_ have a supplemental in fall semesters)</md>
What's the deadline for the application for CS 61A?

161 doesn't have enrollment/budget numbers yet since it hasn't opened for enrollment yet...

I can't speak for other classes, but if you don't see it listed here, that class probably hasn't started the hiring process yet, so all you can do for now is submit the departmental application.

Edit: 161 supplemental is up now.
what about 161?
May 3rd, it should be in the email.
when is the departmental application due, it doesn't say on the app itself?
Eventually there will, but not yet.
Any updates on the supplemental for 61C? Just wanting to make sure I'm not missing anything, sorry to bother you.

It'll be posted here when it's ready. As far as I know we don't have a course budget yet.

Edit: Supplemental form is up now
Is there a 61C supplemental application
I believe for all course staff positions, you must fill out the universal department application and then the supplemental (if the course has one)
What are the steps for joining cs61B course staff? Do we still fill out the universal department application.
<md>last night was the department's priority deadline (61a doesn't have a supplemental application, so the departmental application is the only one you had to submit)</md>
When is the dept priority deadline for fall 2022? I’m looking for cs61a’s
CS 188 TBA on course budget, but hopefully in the coming week or two.
CS 188 form is now up in the post!
When will supplemental apps for CS188 and CS189 released?
Is CS 10 accepting new GSI's for the Fall? If so, is there a supplemental app like there was for the summer?
Hmm - good question. I recommend talking with Christopher Hunn who is teaching it.
Do you have to be a CS Scholar to be a GSI for CS 36?

Courses are required to review all applications submitted before the priority deadline, but budgets are kind of behind this semester so it's possible that classes will still be reviewing submissions afterwards. Depends on what class you're applying for, though.

I updated my written responses, references, etc. Do application reviewers know when an application was updated (if submitted by the priority deadline, but updated afterwards) and are these updates read over and considered when making decisions?

Thanks for reading!
Depends on who's reviewing it, I think.

I missed the priority deadline because I never got notified about the application being open. Does that mean my chances are way lower? The courses I applied for seem to not have a supplemental application out yet.
May I ask where do we apply for 16b course staff?
The supplemental application is live! Here is the link.
Does 16b have a supplemental application?
<md>Yes we will be sending one out this weekend to all those who applied on the departmental application.</md>
have these been sent out, I haven't got one?
Not yet I’ll follow up when we send these out.
<md>Supplementals sent out to those who applied on the official departmental app.</md>
Has 162 finished interviewing?
<md>Not yet we're still in the process.</md>
does 162 have a supplemental app?

Hiring for fall needs to be done before July, most likely sometime in June. Things will vary between classes though, and unexpected circumstances like TAs dropping out or additional budget showing up sometimes lead to hires after the start of the fall semester.
Do results/interviews typically come out in the Fall semester or this semester? Or does it vary with each class? Thanks!
accidental reply, my bad
when is 170 planning on processing reader applications?
When will CS 70 reader applications be processed?
<md>yes see @17152</md>
Are the CS 61A AI applications out yet? If so, where can I apply?

Depends on the class. I know some are interviewing almost everyone, some are only interviewing selected candidates, and some might be doing no interviews at all. Are you wondering about any specific class?
Yeah, we're doing interviews. You should have gotten an email from us if you applied.
What about 189?
Do the cs upperdivs listed do all do interviews?
Not yet
Has 126 been decided?
Probably in a week or so - we're doing 161 interviews first, so 188 hiring is a bit delayed.
When will we hear back regarding CS188 interviews?
61A doesn't have an instructor finalized yet, so I don't think they've started hiring at all.
Approximately when can we expect to hear back regarding CS61A? Thank you!
Just sent out decisions to everyone who applied. Feel free to email cs61c@berkeley.edu if you didn't receive an update.
When will decisions for 61c after the interview come out by? Thank you so much!
I think they've finished hiring TAs.
Any updates on 186 hiring?

188 process has started, so expect to hear something in the next week or two.

170 and 70 readers - check the followups above, I imagine those will be resolved when it's figured out.
any updates on 170 readers, cs 70 readers, or 188 tas?

history.content:
(Centralizing in one post to avoid too many pinned posts)

For all classes, unless otherwise stated, you must also fill out the universal department application at https://deptapps.eecs.berkeley.edu/ase/eecs/apply.

  • CS 61B: @16879_f2
  • CS 61C: supplemental application
    • Please fill out the ASE and supplemental applications by Friday 5/20! If you have questions, please email cs61c@berkeley.edu.
    • We're aiming to have interviews the following week which will be communicated via email.
  • CS 70
    • (u)GSI: No longer accepting applications
    • Reader: Supplemental app, due 11:59 PM PDT on Sunday May 15th. Example responses to long questions that we thought were well-written and gave us a really complete picture of the applicant. 
    • Email hiring@eecs70.org for questions.
  • CS 88: Going forward CS 88 will be hiring through the CDSS ASE Application (as Data/CompSci C88C). Since we're hiring through CDSS, the priority deadline to apply for Fall 2022 is 11:59 PM on Wednesday, April 27th, 2022. Please complete both forms by the priority deadline if you'd like to be considered:
    • ASE Application
    • ASE Supplemental Application for Data Courses
  • CS 161: Supplemental app, due 11:59 PM PST on Friday, May 20th, but we’ll review applications submitted after that date on a rolling basis. Feel free to email cs161-staff@berkeley.edu for questions.
  • CS 162: Supplemental app, due 11:59 PM PST on Sunday, May 22nd. Email cs162@eecs.berkeley.edu for questions.
  • CS 170: Supplemental app.
    • Deadline for TA applications is Thursday April 28th. TA Interviews are on May 4 and 5.
    • Deadline for Reader applications is Sunday May 8th.
  • CS 186: Supplemental app. The priority deadline for both applications is Tuesday, May 3rd, 2022, but we’ll review applications submitted after that date on a rolling basis. Email cs186@berkeley.edu for questions.
  • CS 188: Supplemental app, due 11:59 PM PST on Friday, May 20th, but we’ll review applications submitted after that date on a rolling basis. Feel free to email cs188@berkeley.edu for questions.
  • EECS 16A: Supplemental app. The deadline for completing this New ASE applicaition is Wednesday, May 4th, 2022, 11:59 PT. Email eecs16a@berkeley.edu if you have any questions. Looking forward to reading your applications!
  • EECS 16B: Supplemental app. Priority deadline is Sunday, May 29. Please email eecs16b@berkeley.edu if you have any questions!

history.content:
(Centralizing in one post to avoid too many pinned posts)

  • CS 70: Supplemental app, due 11:59 PM PDT on Sunday May 8th. Email hiring@eecs70.org for questions.
  • CS 88: Going forward CS 88 will be hiring through the CDSS ASE Application (as Data/CompSci C88C). Since we're hiring through CDSS, the priority deadline to apply for Fall 2022 is 11:59 PM on Wednesday, April 27th, 2022. Please complete both forms by the priority deadline if you'd like to be considered:
    • ASE Application
    • ASE Supplemental Application for Data Courses
  • CS 186: Supplemental app. The priority deadline for both applications is Tuesday, May 3rd, 2022, but we’ll review applications submitted after that date on a rolling basis. Email cs186@berkeley.edu for questions.
